name: heat-wave
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.
